# halo2_gadgets [![Crates.io](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/halo2_gadgets.svg)](https://crates.io/crates/halo2_gadgets) #

Requires Rust 1.60+.

## Documentation

- [The Halo 2 Book](https://zcash.github.io/halo2/)
- [Crate documentation](https://docs.rs/halo2_gadgets)
